org.apache.giraph.io

类 VertexOutputFormat<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.conf.DefaultImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      • org.apache.giraph.io.VertexOutputFormat<I,V,E>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex index value
    V - Vertex value
    E - Edge value
    所有已实现的接口:
    ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    直接已知子类:
    SequenceFileVertexOutputFormat, TextVertexOutputFormat

    public abstract class VertexOutputFormat<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends DefaultImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Implement to output the graph after the computation. It is modeled directly after the Hadoop OutputFormat. ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration is available

    • 方法详细资料

      • createVertexWriter

        public abstract VertexWriter<I,V,E> createVertexWriter(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TaskAttemptContext context)
                                                                                                                                                                            throws IOException,
                                                                                                                                                                                   InterruptedException
        Create a vertex writer for a given split. The framework will call VertexWriter.initialize(TaskAttemptContext) before the split is used.
        参数:
        context - the information about the task
        返回:
        a new vertex writer
        抛出:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • checkOutputSpecs

        public abstract void checkOutputSpecs(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.JobContext context)
                               throws IOException,
                                      InterruptedException
        Check for validity of the output-specification for the job. (Copied from Hadoop OutputFormat)

        This is to validate the output specification for the job when it is a job is submitted. Typically checks that it does not already exist, throwing an exception when it already exists, so that output is not overwritten.

        参数:
        context - information about the job
        抛出:
        IOException - when output should not be attempted
        InterruptedException

      • getOutputCommitter

        public abstract org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputCommitter getOutputCommitter(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TaskAttemptContext context)
                                                                        throws IOException,
                                                                               InterruptedException
        Get the output committer for this output format. This is responsible for ensuring the output is committed correctly. (Copied from Hadoop OutputFormat)
        参数:
        context - the task context
        返回:
        an output committer
        抛出:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
